title: Service Engineer (English CV Only)
job_description:
We are a German cutting fluid company and sell our products in Vietnam .
In order to further expand business in Vietnam, we are recruiting staff now.
Please refer to the following application qualifications.
Position: Service engineer
Job content: Attend the oil test and take care of the customer using cutting fluid after we sell.
Job type: Regular employee.
requirements:
Experience: minimum 1 year in cutting fluid company or trading company . It is also OK if you have performed after-sales service on the machine.
Language: Conversational English or Chinese
Education: Secondary school or above.
Age: 22 - 35 years old
